definition: Taishan county level city in Jiangmen 江門|江门, Guangdong
(classical) you (in letters)/variant of 臺|台[tai2]
Taiwan (abbr.)/surname Tai
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
surname Shan
Mt Tiantai near Shaoxing 紹興|绍兴[Shao4 xing1] in Zhejiang, the center of Tiantai Buddhism 天台宗[Tian1 tai2 zong1]
Taishan county level city in Jiangmen 江門|江门, Guangdong
Taishanese, a language of the Yue language group 粵語|粤语[Yue4 yu3] spoken in Jiangmen 江門|江门[Jiang1 men2] and in the Chinatowns of North America

sentences.english: Taishan is well known as the hometown of overseas Chinese in Southern China.
sentences.chinese: 台山是我國嶺南著名的華僑之鄉。

sentences.english: Mr. Li Tieying, new President of Toy Shan Association, extended his holiday greetings to the guests.
sentences.chinese: 台山同鄉會新任會長李鐵英向來賓致以新春問候。

sentences.english: Click to see the Ambassador offer a personal greeting in Cantonese and Taishanese.
sentences.chinese: 點擊觀看大使親自說的廣東話和台山話問候。

sentences.english: Our school stands by the Jiushan River, not far from the Songtai Hill.
sentences.chinese: 我們的學校位於九山河畔，離松台山不遠。

sentences.english: The peaks of Tiantai Mountain in Zhejiang are green and black. They stand like an ornamental screen.
sentences.chinese: 浙江天台山的山峯是青黛色的，猶如豎起的畫屏。

sentences.english: As you know, my ancestral home is in Taishan in Guangdong province.
sentences.chinese: 正如你們所知，我的祖籍在廣東省的台山市。

sentences.english: Ecological Park from Fuzhou Dragon Taishan bus ride to a few?
sentences.chinese: 龍台山生態園從福州坐幾路公交車去？

sentences.english: As recorded in the book, the first place Xu traveled to was Taintai Mountain in Tiantai County, Zhejiang Province.
sentences.chinese: 據史料記載，徐霞客首遊地點爲浙江省天台山。

sentences.english: Tiantai Mountains are located in the middle-EAST of Zhejiang Province, China, ranking amongst National Key Scenic and Historic Interest Spots.
sentences.chinese: 天台山位於浙江省中東部，是國家重點風景名勝區。
